Installation
============

Install
-------

1. Clone the GitHub repository:

   .. code-block:: bash

      git clone https://github.com/Tuxiboule/Python-OC-Lettings-FR.git

2. Navigate to the project directory:

   .. code-block:: bash

      cd Python-OC-Lettings-FR

3. Install dependencies using pipenv:

   .. code-block:: bash
      pip install pipenv
      pipenv install

4. Activate the virtual environment:

   .. code-block:: bash

      pipenv shell

Ensure Docker is installed
---------------------------

Before running the application, make sure Docker is installed on your system. 
Refer to the Docker documentation for installation instructions: `Docker Documentation <https://docs.docker.com/engine/install/>`.
